Problem: Vehicle won't move in any forward or reverse gears(s). Transmission overhauled 3 months ago.
Symptoms: No drive in either forward or reverse.
Verification Result: Fluid level is within required specifications. Condition of fluid appears OK.
Verification Hint: What is the simplest potential cause for this problem?
Rectification Result: Well done. You have identified the fault and corrected it. The last tech forgot to torque the flex plate to converter bolts which backed out and sheared off. This prevented the front pump from being turned, so there was no line pressure. The input shaft turned the gear train but there was no pressure to apply bands and clutches.
Rectification Hint: What possibilities can cause no line pressure?

Verification Tests: Test drive vehicle for operation under initial movement from a standstill and hill starts.
Verification Result: Vehicle  can not be test driven. It won't move.
Identification Result: Fluid level is within required specifications. Condition of fluid appears OK.
Rectification Actions: Replace pan gasket and refill with proper fluid.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.

Verification Tests: Test drive vehicle for operation under all driving conditions when cold.
Verification Result: Vehicle  can not be test driven. It won't move.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.

Verification Tests: Test drive vehicle to determine any unusual transmission noises.
Verification Result: Vehicle  can not be test driven. It won't move.
Identification Tests: Apply air pressure to operate bands and clutches.
Identification Result: Bands and clutches apply normally with no excessive leakage.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.

Verification Tests: Test drive vehicle for operation in reverse.
Verification Result: Vehicle  can not be test driven. It won't move.
Identification Tests: Check transmission cooler system for restriction (flow test).
Rectification Actions: Flush fluid and replace filter, if equipped.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.

Verification Tests: Check gear selector linkage for proper adjustment.
Verification Result: Gear selector linkage appears to be adjusted properly.
Identification Tests: Drop pan, look for plugged filter and debris.
Identification Result: Filter clean and no apparent debris found.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.

Identification Tests: Drop pan, disassemble and inspect valve body.
Identification Result: Valves and valve body in good condition.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.

Identification Tests: Check gear selector linkage for proper adjustment.
Identification Result: Gear selector linkage appears to be adjusted properly.
Rectification Result: This action did not rectify the issue.
